pitch.cc: That was pitch number 105 for Gavin Floyd; his effectiveness may start slipping, as he holds opposing hitters to a .247 average in the first 105 pitches but they hit .500 off him after that.
Dangerous count for Gavin Floyd; Asdrubal Cabrera is a dead-red fastball hitter, with a .844 OPS against them this season and .787 against everything else.
